Icon.Name: ID51361
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:51361 -1.75,-23.91,72.51 74 ^^^ nayad with adds, constantly summons elementals. Stopping the summoning after she is defeated will cause Dutheris, The Dying Dark, an epic x2, to spawn on the bottom floor. If you already killed him, stopping the summoning instead spawns Dutheris, The Dying Dark, an epic x4.

Icon.Name: ID51369
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:51369 -0.09,1.81,11.82 75 ^^^ Nayad with two adds. Constantly summons Power of the Nizari, little adds that do magic damage. A high arcane resist will help you ignore them. Need to defeat K'hazid and K'huthas to be able to reach her.

Icon.Name: ID51362
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:51362 38.13,15.30,-23.96 74 ^^^ named fire elemental with adds, has incurable elemental debuff. You can't pass through the wall of fire until K'huthas, the water elemental lord, is killed as well.

Icon.Name: ID51368
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:51368 -33.66,15.30,-16.45 74 ^^^ water elemental. Has a debuff that blurs vision. Killing this mob as well as the fire elemental K'hazid will lower the fire barrier near K'hazid, allowing you to progress on to the final boss.
